answers.answer: It could be your sugar level. I would ask your doctor.
Did you take ur GD (Gestational diabetes) test??? If so did you pass???I agree with jahayla or high blood pressure
No they haven't done that to me
I have high blood pressure and my doctors took me off my medicine so now when I eat my heart beats rapidly im actually thinking about changing doctors

Im 21 weeks and had this fast heart beat n palpitations and could feel the heartbeat literally outside  and on monitoring it was always near 100 +-5 bpm ...i went for check up n they did ecg n few blood tests. Apparently the ecg was normal apart from high heart rate  (sinus tachycardia). Just got the blood reports n have yet to see the doc tomorrow. They said iron levels were very low n kidney also seem to be working hard. Would know exact thing tomorrow. I agree with other ladies here and would suggest you to see your doc. Happy testing :) good luck!
Thanks ladies:) I will let my doctor know tomorrow at my appointment
Described me to a t and I have high blood pressure! Talk to your doctor, don't be afraid to get a second opinion!

question: So I'm 26 weeks pregnant and this just started happening after every meal I feel dizzy and faint and heart starts beating fast..what can it be???
title: what can it be???
